original_text: Then Abimelech took sheep and oxen, and male servants and female servants, and gave them to Abraham, and returned Sarah his wife to him.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 양과 소와 종들을 이끌어 아브라함에게 주고 그의 아내 사라도 그에게 돌려보내고

sentences.original_text: Then Abimelech took sheep and oxen
and male servants and female servants
and returned Sarah his wife to him
